localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Assessment of the potential and likelihood of future adverse health effects as determined by identified risk factors.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Bewertung der möglichen und wahrscheinlichen gesundheitsschädigenden Wirkungen anhand der identifizierten Risikofaktoren.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Evaluación del potencial y probabilidad de futuros efectos adversos para la salud determinados por la identificación de factores de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Bedömning av potential och sannolikhet för framtida negativa hälsoeffekter som bestäms av identifierade riskfaktorer.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Assessment of the potential and likelihood of future adverse health effects as determined by identified risk factors.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Vurdering av potensiale og sannsynlighet for fremtidige uønskede helseeffekter, bestemt ut fra spesifikke risikofaktorer.
localizedDescriptions.it: Valutazione del potenziale e della probabilità di futuri effetti negativi per la salute, determinati da fattori di rischio identificati.
localizedDescriptions.en: Assessment of the potential and likelihood of future adverse health effects as determined by identified risk factors.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Identification of the potential future disease, condition or health issue for which the risk is being assessed, by name.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Identifizierung der potenziellen zukünftigen Krankheit, des Zustands oder des Gesundheitsproblems, für die das Risiko bewertet wird.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Identificación, por nombre, de la enfermedad, condición o problema de salud potenciales para el cual se evalua el riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Identifiering med namn av den potentiella framtida sjukdomen, tillståndet eller hälsotillståndet för vilken risken är bedömd.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Identification of the potential future disease, condition or health issue for which the risk is being assessed, by name.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Navnet på den potensielle fremtidige sykdommen, tilstanden eller helseproblemet som risikoen gjelder.
localizedDescriptions.it: Identificazione della potenziale futura malattia, condizione o problema sanitario per il quale si sta valutando il rischio, per nome.
localizedDescriptions.en: Identification of the potential future disease, condition or health issue for which the risk is being assessed, by name.

annotations.comment: Coding of 'Health risk' with a terminology is preferred, where possible. Free text should be used only if there is no appropriate terminology available. For example: risk of cardiovascular disease, with risk factors of hypertension and hypercholesterolaemia.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Details about each possible risk factor.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Angaben zu jedem möglichen Risikofaktor.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Detalles acerca de cada factor de riesgo posible.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Detaljer om varje möjlig riskfaktor.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Details about each possible risk factor.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Detaljer om hver enkelt mulige risikofaktor.
localizedDescriptions.it: Dettagliati su ogni possibile fattore di rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: Details about each possible risk factor.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Identification of the risk factor, by name.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Identifizierung des Risikofaktors über einen Namen.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Identificación, por nombre, del factor de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Identifiering med namn av riskfaktorn.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Identification of the risk factor, by name.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Navnet på risikofaktoren.
localizedDescriptions.it: Identificazione del fattore di rischio, per nome.
localizedDescriptions.en: Identification of the risk factor, by name.

annotations.comment:
For example: hypertension and hypercholesterolaemia, which may be used as part of the overall assessment for cardiovascular disease; or a genetic marker. Coding of 
'Risk factor' with a terminology, where possible.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Presence of the risk factor.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Vorhandensein des Risikofaktors.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Presencia del factor de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Förekomst av riskfaktor.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Presence of the risk factor.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Risikofaktorens tilstedeværelse.
localizedDescriptions.it: Presenza del fattore di rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: Presence of the risk factor.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *The risk factor has been identified for this individual.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Der Risikofaktor wurde bei der Person identifiziert.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: El factor de riesgo ha sido identificado para este individuo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Riskfaktorn har identifierats för den här personen.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *The risk factor has been identified for this individual.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Risikofaktoren er tilstede hos individet.
localizedDescriptions.it: Il fattore di rischio è stato identificato per questo individuo.
localizedDescriptions.en: The risk factor has been identified for this individual.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *It is not possible to determine if the risk factor is present or absent.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Es ist nicht möglich festzustellen, ob der Risikofaktor vorhanden oder nicht vorhanden ist.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: No es posible determinar la presencia o ausencia del factor de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Det är inte möjligt att bestämma om riskfaktorn finns eller är frånvarande.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *It is not possible to determine if the risk factor is present or absent.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Det er ikke mulig å fastslå om risikofaktoren er tilstede eller fraværende.
localizedDescriptions.it: Non è possibile determinare se il fattore di rischio è presente o assente.
localizedDescriptions.en: It is not possible to determine if the risk factor is present or absent.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *The risk factor has not been identified for this individual.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Der Risikofaktor wurde bei der Person nicht festgestellt.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: El factor de riesgo no ha sido identificado para este individuo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Riskfaktorn har inte identifierats för den här personen.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *The risk factor has not been identified for this individual.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Risikofaktoren er ikke tilstede hos individet.
localizedDescriptions.it: Il fattore di rischio non è stato identificato per questo individuo.
localizedDescriptions.en: The risk factor has not been identified for this individual.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Narrative description about the risk factor.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Beschreibung des Risikofaktors.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Descripción narrativa del factor de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Berättande beskrivning om riksfaktorn.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Narrative description about the risk factor.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Fritekst beskrivelse av risikofaktoren.
localizedDescriptions.it: Descrizione narrativa del fattore di rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: Narrative description about the risk factor.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *The date/time that the risk factor was identified.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Der Zeitpunkt an dem der Risikofaktor identifiziert wurde.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: *The date/time that the risk factor was identified.(en)
localizedDescriptions.sv: Datum/tid då riskfaktorn konstaterades.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *The date/time that the risk factor was identified.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Dato / klokkeslett da risikofaktoren ble påvist.
localizedDescriptions.it: La data/ora in cui è stato individuato il fattore di rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: The date/time that the risk factor was identified.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *The risk factor has been identified as present, but then subsequently been mitigated by treatment or investigation.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Der Risikofaktor wurde als vorhanden identifiziert, anschließend jedoch durch Behandlung oder Untersuchung vermindert.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: El factor de riesgo esta presente pero ha sido subsecuentemente mitigado por tratamiento o investigación.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Riskfaktorn har identifierats att den finns, men har därefter minskats genom behandling eller undersökning.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *The risk factor has been identified as present, but then subsequently been mitigated by treatment or investigation.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Risikofaktoren er identifisert som tilstede, men er deretter moderert ved behandling eller utredning.
localizedDescriptions.it: Il fattore di rischio è stato identificato come presente, ma successivamente è stato mitigato da un trattamento o da un'indagine.
localizedDescriptions.en: The risk factor has been identified as present, but then subsequently been mitigated by treatment or investigation.

annotations.comment: Record as True if the risk factor has been treated or investigated and risk from this risk factor is considered to be lessened. For example: an infant given gentamicin in neonatal intensive care is regarded as having a risk of permanent hearing loss. If diagnostic testing shows no evidence of hearing loss in the first year of life, the risk of later hearing loss is considered to be much reduced, but still possible. This data element allows clinicians to say that the risk has been mitigated but should still be considered as a possibility in future. In practice, the risk factor could be maintained in the risk assessment in case it might impact the individual's health at a future time, but flagging that its contribution to risk calculation may not be as great as if it had not been previously treated or investigated.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Identification of the path to the archetype or data node for the evidence of risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Identifizierung des Pfades zum Archetyp oder Datenknoten zum Nachweis des Risikos.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Identificación del path al arquetipo o nodo de datos que contiene la evidencia del riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Identifiering av sökvägen till arketypen eller datanoden för evidensen för risk.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Identification of the path to the archetype or data node for the evidence of risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Sti til arketypen eller dataelementet der underlagsinformasjonen for risikofaktoren er lagret.
localizedDescriptions.it: Identificazione del percorso dell'archetipo o del nodo dati per l'evidenza del rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: Identification of the path to the archetype or data node for the evidence of risk.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Additional narrative about the risk factor not captured in other fields.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Zusätzliche Informationen zum Risikofaktor, welche in anderen Bereichen nicht erfasst wurden.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: *Additional narrative about the risk factor not captured in other fields.(en)
localizedDescriptions.sv: Ytterligare beskrivning av riskfaktorn som inte fångats i andra fält.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Additional narrative about the risk factor not captured in other fields.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Ytterligere fritekst om risikofaktoren som ikke er fanget opp i andre felt.
localizedDescriptions.it: Narrativa aggiuntiva sul fattore di rischio non catturato in altri campi.
localizedDescriptions.en: Additional narrative about the risk factor not captured in other fields.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Bewertung des Gesundheitsrisikos.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Evaluación del riesgo para la salud.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Utvärdering av hälsorisken.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Evaluering av helserisikoen.
localizedDescriptions.it: Valutazione del rischio per la salute.
localizedDescriptions.en: Evaluation of the health risk.

annotations.comment: There may be multiple variations on the assessment of risk. The Choice data type allows for recording of the assessment as either free text or value sets (such as low, medium or hig). The proportion data type allows recording of a percentage, a ratio or a fraction. The quantity data type allows recording of a decimal number.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Bewertung des Gesundheitsrisikos.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Evaluación del riesgo para la salud.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Utvärdering av hälsorisken.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Evaluering av helserisikoen.
localizedDescriptions.it: Valutazione del rischio per la salute.
localizedDescriptions.en: Evaluation of the health risk.

localizedDescriptions.de: Bewertung des Gesundheitsrisikos.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Evaluación del riesgo para la salud.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Utvärdering av hälsorisken.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Evaluering av helserisikoen.
localizedDescriptions.it: Valutazione del rischio per la salute.
localizedDescriptions.en: Evaluation of the health risk.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Bewertung des Gesundheitsrisikos.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Evaluación del riesgo para la salud.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Utvärdering av hälsorisken.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Evaluation of the health risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Evaluering av helserisikoen.
localizedDescriptions.it: Valutazione del rischio per la salute.
localizedDescriptions.en: Evaluation of the health risk.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Record of whether the risk assessment is a relative or absolute.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Zur Darstellung der relativen oder absoluten Risikobewertung.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Registro acerca de la condición relativa o absoluta de la evaluación del riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Uppgift om riskbedömningen är relativ eller absolut.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Record of whether the risk assessment is a relative or absolute.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Registrering av hvorvidt risikovurderingen er relativ eller absolutt.
localizedDescriptions.it: Raccordare se la valutazione del rischio è relativa o assoluta.
localizedDescriptions.en: Record of whether the risk assessment is a relative or absolute.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Ratio of probability of a health event or condition occurring compared to a population with similar characteristics eg same age and sex.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Verhältnis der Wahrscheinlichkeit des Auftretens eines Gesundheitsereignisses oder -zustands im Vergleich zu einer Population mit ähnlichen Merkmalen, z. B. gleichem Alter und Geschlecht.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Probabilidad de la ocurrencia de un evento o condición de salud en comparación con una población de características similares. Ejemplo: mismo sexo y edad.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Förhållande mellan sannolikheten för ett hälsohändelse eller ett tillstånd som uppstår jämfört med en befolkning med liknande egenskaper, t.ex. samma ålder och kön.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Ratio of probability of a health event or condition occurring compared to a population with similar characteristics eg same age and sex.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Proporsjonal sannsynlighet for at en helserelatert hendelse eller tilstand skal opptre sammenlignet med en populasjon med lignende karakteristika, som f.eks. samme alder og kjønn.
localizedDescriptions.it: Rapporto di probabilità che si verifichi un evento o una condizione di salute rispetto ad una popolazione con caratteristiche simili, ad esempio la stessa età e lo stesso sesso.
localizedDescriptions.en: Ratio of probability of a health event or condition occurring compared to a population with similar characteristics eg same age and sex.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Ratio of probability of a health event or condition occurring compared to the population as a whole.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Verhältnis der Wahrscheinlichkeit des Auftretens eines Gesundheitsereignisses oder -zustands im Vergleich zur Gesamtbevölkerung.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Probabilidad de la ocurrencia de un evento o condición de salud en comparación con el total de la población.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Förhållandet mellan sannolikheten för en hälsohändelse eller ett tillstånd som uppstår i förhållande till befolkningen som helhet.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Ratio of probability of a health event or condition occurring compared to the population as a whole.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Proporsjonal sannsynlighet for at en helserelatert hendelse eller tilstand skal opptre sammenlignet med befolkningen som en helhet.
localizedDescriptions.it: Rapporto di probabilità che un evento o una condizione di salute si verifichi rispetto alla popolazione nel suo complesso.
localizedDescriptions.en: Ratio of probability of a health event or condition occurring compared to the population as a whole.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *The time period during which the predicted health risk is relevant.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Der Zeitraum, in dem das vorhergesagte Gesundheitsrisiko relevant ist.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: El período de tiempo durante el cual el riesgo para la salud previsto es relevante.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Den tidsperiod under vilken den förutspådda hälsorisken är relevant.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *The time period during which the predicted health risk is relevant.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Tidsrammen helserisikoen er relevant i.
localizedDescriptions.it: Il periodo di tempo durante il quale il rischio previsto per la salute è rilevante.
localizedDescriptions.en: The time period during which the predicted health risk is relevant.

annotations.comment: That is: the risk of experiencing the identified 'Health risk' in the next <X> years.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Justification for this risk assessment.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Begründung für die Risikobewertung.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Justificación para esta evaluación de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Motivering för denna riskbedömning.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Justification for this risk assessment.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Berettigelse for risikovurderingen.
localizedDescriptions.it: Giustificazione di questa valutazione del rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: Justification for this risk assessment.

annotations.comment: Details that may be added to this data element may include information about the population subgroups etc against which the determination of risk is assessed.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Additional narrative about the risk assessment not captured in other fields.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Zusätzliche Informationen über die Risikobewertung, welche in anderen Bereichen nicht erfasst wurden.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Narrativa adicional acerca de la evaluación de riesgo no contemplada en otros campos.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Ytterligare beskrivning om riskbedömningen som inte tagits med i andra fält.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Additional narrative about the risk assessment not captured in other fields.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Fritekst om risikovurderingen som ikke passer i andre felt.
localizedDescriptions.it: Narrativa aggiuntiva sulla valutazione del rischio non catturata in altri campi.
localizedDescriptions.en: Additional narrative about the risk assessment not captured in other fields.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *The date this health risk assessment was last updated.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Das Datum an dem die Bewertung des Gesundheitsrisikos zuletzt aktualisiert wurde.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: La fecha en la cual se realizó la ultima actualización de este factor de riesgo para la salud.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Datumet när hälsoriskbedömningen senast uppdaterades.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *The date this health risk assessment was last updated.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Datoen da risikovurderingen sist ble oppdatert.
localizedDescriptions.it: La data dell'ultimo aggiornamento di questa valutazione del rischio per la salute.
localizedDescriptions.en: The date this health risk assessment was last updated.

annotations.comment: This data element may be thought redundant if the data is recorded and stored using COMPOSITIONs within a closed clinical system. However if this information is extracted from its original COMPOSITION context, for example, to be included in another document or message then the temporal context is effectively removed. This 'Last updated' data element has been explicitly added to allow the critical temporal data to be kept alongside the clinical data in all circumstances. It is assumed that the clinical system can copy the date from the COMPOSITION to reduce the need for duplication of data entry by the clinician.

localizedDescriptions.ar-sy: *Identification of the algorithm or guideline used to make the assessment of risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.de: Identifikation des Algorithmus oder der Leitlinie, welche für die Risikobewertung verwendet wurde.
localizedDescriptions.es-ar: Identificación del algoritmo o de la guia utilziada para realizar la evaluación de riesgo.
localizedDescriptions.sv: Identifiering av metoden eller riktlinjen som används för bedömning av risker.
localizedDescriptions.fi: *Identification of the algorithm or guideline used to make the assessment of risk.(en)
localizedDescriptions.nb: Algoritmen eller regelen som ble brukt til å gjøre risikovurderingen.
localizedDescriptions.it: Identificazione dell'algoritmo o della linea guida utilizzata per effettuare la valutazione del rischio.
localizedDescriptions.en: Identification of the algorithm or guideline used to make the assessment of risk.

annotations.comment: For example: Framingham cardiovascular risk calculator.
